task.title: Search a test case by custom fields and tags

taskbody.context: After assigning custom fields and tags to your test cases, you can search test cases in the test case list by filtering custom fields and tags.

step.cmd: From the Test Case page, click the filter icon on the Search test case bar.test case filter

Within the filter list, navigate to Custom Fields and Tags. Select from the dropdown list below each of them the custom fields and tags based on which you want to query your test case. Click Apply and search to search for test cases with selected custom fields and tags.

image.alt: search test case by custom fields and tags

taskbody.result: Your search result displays all test cases with selected custom fields and tags.test case search result
